59604.61	1.52e+41	1.51e+40	1.34e+42	5.24e+42

#KEY
# Lobs = integrate observed fluxes with no BB fit
# L+BB = observed flux + BB fit extrapolation
# See logL-obs_2020hgw_griz.txt and logL-bb_2020hgw_griz.txt for simple LC files
# Methodology:
# filters used:griz
# redshift used:0.043
# extinction used:0.011
# Flux and wavelength converted to rest-frame
# BB fit below 1A suppressed by factor (lamda/1)^0
